definition: to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format

sentences.english: It was tabloid size and had only eight pages, which were badly printed.
sentences.chinese: 那是一份小开报纸，只有八页，印刷得很粗糙。

definition: a branch of the Xianbei 鮮卑|鲜卑 nomadic people/two-character surname Murong
Nangong county level city in Xingtai 邢台[Xing2 tai2], Hebei
abbr. for 梵教[Fan4 jiao4] Brahmanism/abbr. for Sanskrit 梵語|梵语[Fan4 yu3] or 梵文[Fan4 wen2]/abbr. for 梵蒂岡|梵蒂冈[Fan4 di4 gang1], the Vatican
many things arranged together, or connected together/to go on limitlessly
great emptiness/the void/heaven/the skies/universe/cosmos/original essence of the cosmos
a branch of the Xianbei 鮮卑|鲜卑[Xian1 bei1] nomadic people/two-character surname Yuwen
